page.title: 15A LOCAL HOSTELRY
page.content: Hayes has two main public houses and both focus on food. The most historical is the George, which still has stable doors behind it. It probably takes its name from George 111. In the old days stocks stood outside. Today it is a Berni Steak House. We learnt that its busiest lunchtimes were on Wednesdays and Sundays. Saturday was the busiest evening. The most popular meal is steak, french fries and salad with strawberries. About 1800 meals are served a week. 124 people can be seated in the restaurants. There are heat detectors against fire, and there is a fire drill. 75 people work in the George, 10 chefs, a manager and 2 assistant managers are full time, the rest are part-time. 95% of the people who come in are diners.
